game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient temple's hidden artifact and return it to the village elder.
game.description: The village has been plagued by a series of strange occurrences, and the village elder believes that an ancient temple holds the key to unlocking the source of the problem. Your mission is to retrieve the temple's hidden artifact and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: 10 gold pieces and the gratitude of the village elder

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's location
task.description: Speak with the local villagers and gather any information they may have about the temple's location. Be careful, as some of the villagers may be hostile.
Once you have gathered enough information about the temple's location, head out to explore the ancient structure. Be cautious, as the temple is said to be filled with traps and puzzles.
Deep within the temple, you will find a chamber containing the ancient relic. Once you have obtained it, make your way back to the village.
task.location: The Chamber of the Ancient Relic
